casepack.title: Security Validation CasePack
casepack.description: UMCP-based security validation demonstrating 'What Returns Through Collapse Is Real' applied to security domain (anti-virus, anti-scam, identity, privacy).

run_intent.notes: This CasePack demonstrates UMCP security validation. Entities are validated against frozen Tier-0 policy, Tier-1 invariants computed, and validation receipts issued. Only entities that 'return through collapse' (tau_R finite, IC above threshold) are marked TRUSTED.

axiom_application.core_axiom: What Returns Through Collapse Is Real

tier_mapping.tier_0: Frozen security policy - threat signatures, trust baselines, validation rules
tier_mapping.tier_1: Deterministic security kernel - invariants T, theta, H, D, sigma, TIC, tau_A
tier_mapping.tier_2: Diagnostic overlays - threat classification, reputation, behavior analysis
